channel.title: Projects on Carson Quigley
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Carson Quigley

item.title: Summer 2018 - Scheduling Problem in Big Data Workflows
item.description: A Brief Synopsis During the Summer of 2018 I worked with Dr. Aravind Mohan to deconstruct algorithms that attempted to solve the well known Scheduling Problem in the realm of cloud computing. This research led to my presentation of a poster detailing our work towards the end of the research period. item.title: Summer 2017 - Postmodernist Studies
item.description: A Brief Synopsis My work over the summer of 2017 with Professor Xiaoling Shi was about postmodernism and the influances it had on the particular work, A Death In Chicago by Xianyoung. I did much reasearch on postmodernist works during the 1920’s era that may have influanced Xianyoung’s work.
